## GraphStructure.outgoing property

Forward adjacency list: nodeId -<!-- -->&gt; all output connections from this node

**Signature:**

```typescript
outgoing: Record<number, NodeConnection[]>;
```

## Remarks

Used to quickly find which nodes a given node connects to
